```{r}
dispersion.plot <- function(entries, bins = 100){
  #entries <- dispersion(array)
  ggplot() + 
    geom_histogram(data = entries, aes(x = diff), fill = "darkorchid4", bins = bins)
}
```

```{r}
N <- 30
P <- RME_norm(N, size = 10000)
diffs <- dispersion(P)
dispersion.plot(diffs)
```

```{r}
N <- 20
P <- RME_stoch(N = 20, size = 1000)
diffs <- dispersion(P)
dispersion.plot(diffs)
```

```{r}
beta.DISP <- function(beta, bins = 100){
  P <- RME_beta(N = 50, beta, size = 1000)
  diffs <- dispersion(P)
  dispersion.plot(diffs, bins) + labs(title = paste("Beta =",beta))
}
```
